CustomField.description: The relationship field on the SObject that should be queried (e.g., Event.WhatId for relationships between Account and Event, or CustomObject__c.CustomLookup__c for relationships between AnotherCustomObject__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The relationship field on the SObject that should be queried (e.g., Event.WhatId for relationships between Account and Event, or CustomObject__c.CustomLookup__c for relationships between AnotherCustomObject__c)
CustomField.label: SObject Relationship Field
